name: Sonofander
body:
# SonOfAnder Chris Anderson

Christopher Anderson>

My name is Chris Anderson and I have many exciting hobbies. My hobbies include hiking in the mountains, volunteering at a local camp, and studying Greek. More information about my volunteer work can be found at here. I also learn more about Greek at here. I also love sharing my faith with anyone who is willing to listen, and sometimes people who don't care to listen. I am studying Bible at Bob Jones University so it gives me a great excuse to share the Gospel with people.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
